body_html:
@MlWoo Thanks! The gemv thing is probably a bug.

On ger: blas assumes col major (https://www.math.utah.edu/software/lapack/lapack-blas/sger.html) likely due to that row major is easy to work around by changing the vectors' order. We already do that here. https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/aten/src/TH/generic/THTensorMath.c#L1558-L1571.
